title: Polar Function - Describing Behaviors - Part C

content.question: Part C (i) Find the zeros of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>θ</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaaguart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadAgacaaMi8UaaiikaiabeI7aXjaacMcaaaa@3BD2@</annotation> </semantics> </math> for <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>1.5</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E4F@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. (ii) In terms of the graph of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaaguart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadkhacqGH9aqpcaWGMbGaaiikaiabeI7aXjaacMcaaaa@3C3E@</annotation> </semantics> </math> in the polar coordinate system, interpret the meaning of the values of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>θ</mi> </math> found in part (i).

frqParts.text: Part C (i) Find the zeros of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>θ</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaaguart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadAgacaaMi8UaaiikaiabeI7aXjaacMcaaaa@3BD2@</annotation> </semantics> </math> for <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>1.5</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E4F@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. (ii) In terms of the graph of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaaguart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadkhacqGH9aqpcaWGMbGaaiikaiabeI7aXjaacMcaaaa@3C3E@</annotation> </semantics> </math> in the polar coordinate system, interpret the meaning of the values of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>θ</mi> </math> found in part (i).

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
